person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: And my mandate is also under Chapter Seven to operate in eastern Zaire . "

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| I |
| my mandate |
| Chapter Seven |

Explanation:
The only potential entity in the paragraph is "my mandate," which refers to a specific authorization or commission given to someone. "Chapter Seven" is a part of a larger document, in this case, the United Nations Charter, so it is not considered a person.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| I |
| my mandate |

Explanation:
The only clear entity in the paragraph that refers to a person is "I," and "my mandate" is an entity that refers to an authorization or commission given to a person. Other entities such as "Chapter Seven" and "eastern Zaire" are not persons.
